thread.title: How to Win a High-School Debate: Talk Like a Cattle Auctioneer

author: Daniel Kruger
title: How to Win a High-School Debate: Talk Like a Cattle Auctioneer
text:
LEXINGTON, Mass.—For weeks, high school debater Benjamin Waldman rehearsed his argument affirming the resolution that the criminal-justice system should abolish plea bargaining. Now that it was time to speak, he took a deep breath and let it rip.
“...thecriminaljusticesystemisareflectionofandapplicationofthelawandimpositionofpunishments.Pleabargainingwasamechanismforthesejudgestomaintaintheirvastpoweranddiscretion…”
After...
